channel.title: Need help portforwarding server with Linksys
channel.description: Ok well the title says it all. I just got a Linksys router thing and i can't get it to portforward. I went to my address thing and went to game and applications and i got all that right with the 43594 port things. i have a port checker and it says my port is open. i got a ip thing and i can't figure out why i can't log onto my server with the ip address the only way i can get on is if i do 0.0.0.0, so any one got and ideas what wrong.?? :confused: :confused:

item.title: Need help portforwarding server with Linksys
item.dc:creator: @owner_aab owner aab
item.description:
@owner_aab wrote:

Ok well the title says it all. I just got a Linksys router thing and i can’t get it to portforward. I went to my address thing and went to game and applications and i got all that right with the 43594 port things. i have a port checker and it says my port is open. i got a ip thing and i can’t figure out why i can’t log onto my server with the ip address the only way i can get on is if i do 0.0.0.0, so any one got and ideas what wrong.??
